00022 BEHAVIOR_STATUS GotoPoint::execute(void* agent)
00023 {
00024         cout << "going to point " << target.toString() << endl;
00025         GameObject* ship = (GameObject*) agent;
00026         int timeElapsed = ws->timeElapsed;
00027 
00028         point vectorToTarget = target - ship->location;
00029         if (vectorToTarget.vectorSize() < 10)
00030                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00031         vectorToTarget.normalize();
00032         vectorToTarget *= (float)(timeElapsed * speed /1000.0f);
00033 
00034         point finalPosition = point(vectorToTarget.x + ship->getXPosition(),vectorToTarget.y + ship->getYPosition());
00035         ws->moveObject(ship,finalPosition);
00036         return BT_RUNNING;
00037 
00038 }
